Title: Relates to licensure, certification or registration and required inspections, background clearances and training for child care providers; repealer
Summary: Provides that the period of licensure or certification for child care providers shall be for four years; relates to required inspections and background clearances; directs the office of children and family services to promulgate necessary rules and regulations setting forth training requirements.
LawCode: Amd §§390, 390-a, 390-b, 422 & 424-a, rpld §390-b subs 1 - 3, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the licensure, registration and required inspections, background clearances and training for child care providers; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
